description:
***Discover the methods of how to break dance and what secrets that these other instructors don't want you to know!

One-on-one instructional videos teaching you step-by-step that will guide and help you improve your dance moves in NO TIME!***

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey what's up bboys and bgirls, my name is Jax Hsu aka Bboy Jax Fermada. I am a world class bboy and Youtube dance instructor specialize on teaching people how to break dance. I've been breaking, battling, performing and teaching for 10+ years.

My program is designed to take you step-by-step, breaking down each move to help you to understand the moves in simple form.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

First part of the program, I will be demonstrating and teaching you .....

1.) The proper and correct way to hold a "FOOTWORK POSTURE"

2.) A "GET DOWN" that allows you to transition from top (standing) to bottom (floor)

3.) "9 DIFFERENT" footwork steps

4.) How to combo the moves TOGETHER!

5.) Bonus Footage - Battling around the world!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Second part of the program, I will be answer some of the most frequently asked questions from my students.

1.) How to develop my own style?

- The 3 Rules to naturally develop our own style so we can create original, "UNIQUE" bboy moves

2.) How to become more confident in battles and cyphers?

- The methods to improving "CONFIDENCE" under pressure (battles and cyphers)

3.) How to freestyle without repeating moves?

- The "5 MOVEMENT CONCEPT" to enhance your freestyle

4.) How to win battles and stand out?

- "6 COMMON BATTLE MISTAKES" to avoid in order to increase your winning percentage and help you stand out in battles or cyphers

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Third and last part of the program, we will be getting into the advance footwork steps.

1.) 7 ORIGINAL and UNIQUE footwork steps to improve your dance moves

2.) Bonus Footage - The Art of Freestyling!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

***Get the entire package for only $49***

Just Break - Footwork Fundamental Vol.1

Bonus - Around the World Battle Footage

FAQ - The Hidden Secrets of How to Break Dance

Just Break - Advance Footwork

Bonus - The Art of Freestyling
title: JUST BREAK | The Hidden Methods of How to Break Dance
